text: The 2016–17 Austrian Cup () was the 83rd season of Austria's nationwide football cup competition. Red Bull Salzburg were the defending champions. == Dates == The schedule are as follows: * First round: 8, 15–17 July 2016 * Second round: 20–21 September 2016 * Third round: 25–26 October 2016 * Quarterfinals: 4–5 April 2017 * Semifinals: 25–26 April 2017 * Final: 1 June 2017 at Klagenfurt == Matches == *The level of the league is given in brackets === First round === (All times given in CEST) === Second round === (All times given in CEST) === Third round === (All times given in CEST) === Quarter- finals === (All times given in CEST) === Semi-finals === The draw for the semifinals took place on 9 April. title: 2016–17 Austrian Cup
